Definition: In this task, you are given a news article. Your task is to classify the article to one out of the four topics 'World', 'Sports', 'Business', 'Sci/Tech'. This is based on the article's main topic being relevant to the world, sports, business, and science/technology, correspondingly. If you are unsure about the topic, choose the closest option. Note that URLs in the text have been replaced with [Link].
